text: Greg W. Hinkle is a Republican member of the Montana Legislature. He was elected to Senate District 9, representing Thompson Falls, Montana, in 2009 and 2011. Hinkle served in the Army National Guard from 1966 to 1972. He owns Hinkle's Hardwood Furniture. ==References== Category:Living people Category:1946 births Category:Montana Republicans Category:Montana state senators Category:Politicians from Bellingham, Washington Category:People from Thompson Falls, Montana
title: Greg Hinkle
